title: entha pEDi
sahitya:
entha pEDi prANigaLirA santata haridAsarAgi


anupallavi

  antakapura sukhavilla yamanu bahu holla


caraNam 1    kaDeya jhAvadaleddu hariya smaraNeya mADi nuDi hariya kIrtane oDane mADi 
kaDu snEhadali karava pAda kamaladalliTTu biDade sEveya mADo cittavalliDo
    caraNam 2    madhva matavena bhajiso madananayyana oliso uddhariso ninna kula chalavu bEDa 
siddhAntanendeniso sujana sangava bayaso abaddha mAtena tyajiso hariya bhajiso
    caraNam 3    prEmadali ghanasukha nEmadali harisakha durmtagaLa biTTu duSTara sanga aTTu 
amarapati gaNapriya purandara viTTalanna kramadinda mare hokku nambi sukha dakko
